mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie(movieno, managerno, genreno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(movie_seq.nextval, #{managerno}, #{genreno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT movieno, managerno, genreno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM movie ORDER BY movieno DESC
SELECT movieno, managerno, genreno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM movie WHERE genreno = #{genreno} ORDER BY movieno DESC
SELECT movieno, managerno, genreno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM movie WHERE movieno = #{movieno}

SELECT movieno, managerno, genreno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM movie
WHERE genreno=#{genreno}
WHERE genreno=#{genreno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY movieno DESC
